name: Export Original Images
description:
This plugin allows you to export images from your selection without any crop and in their native size.


If you ever received a design without the images used in the file attached, this plugin is here to help.


How to use:

  • Select one or multiple elements having an image in their Fill property
  • Run the plugin
  • Save your selection on your computer


Good to know:

  • If you select only one image, the plugin will export that image directly.
  • If you select multiples images, a zip file will be exported.
  • All the images are exported as PNG to avoid losing any information during the export.
  • The original metadata of the images cannot be exported, only the original pixels are.
